entities.description: Indicates if the respondent has driven a vehicle under the influence of marijuana in the past 12 months.
Indicates if the respondent has driven a vehicle under the influence of cocaine in the past 12 months.
Indicates if the respondent has driven a vehicle under the influence of heroin in the past 12 months.
Indicates if the respondent has driven a vehicle under the influence of hallucinogens in the past 12 months.
An individual who participates in the survey.
The timeframe referring to the previous 12 months from today's date.

relationships.description: Indicates if the respondent has driven under the influence of marijuana.
Indicates if the respondent has driven under the influence of cocaine.
Indicates if the respondent has driven under the influence of heroin.
Indicates if the respondent has driven under the influence of hallucinogens.
Specifies that driving under the influence of marijuana occurred within the past 12 months.
Specifies that driving under the influence of cocaine occurred within the past 12 months.
Specifies that driving under the influence of heroin occurred within the past 12 months.
Specifies that driving under the influence of hallucinogens occurred within the past 12 months.
